Instruction: Melt butter in a 4-quart saucepan over medium heat. Season pork chops with salt and pepper on both sides, then add them to the saucepan along with onion and garlic. Cook for 3 minutes, then flip chops and cook for an additional 3 minutes. Add basil, tomatoes, mushrooms, milk, and soup. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes. Afterward, turn chops, stir, and simmer for another 30 minutes. When ready to serve, spoon sauce over chops and top each with a dollop of sour cream.
